## About

I am a Research Engineer at NTT (Human Informatics Laboratories, Japan) since 2019.  
My research interests include neural networks, optimization, vision and language models, and meta-learning.

## Brief CV

- **Jan. 2019 – Present**: Researcher, NTT Corporation, Japan  
- **Apr. 2018 – Dec. 2018**: Postdoctoral Fellow (PD), Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS)  
- **Apr. 2016 – Mar. 2018**: Ph.D. student, Graduate School of Engineering, Osaka Prefecture University  
- **Apr. 2014 – Mar. 2016**: M.S. student, Graduate School of Engineering, Osaka Prefecture University  
- **Apr. 2011 – Mar. 2014**: Undergraduate studies, Osaka Prefecture University (Early graduation)
